channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Maven Release Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Maven Release Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10359|2024-08-04T22:17:20.367Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.14.0 and earlier in the M2ReleaseAction#doSubmit method allowed attackers to perform releases with attacker-specified options.

item.title: CVE-2019-10360|2024-08-04T22:17:20.487Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: A stored cross site scripting vulnerability in Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.14.0 and earlier allowed attackers to inject arbitrary HTML and JavaScript in the plugin-provided web pages in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-10361|2024-08-04T22:17:20.590Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.14.0 and earlier stored credentials unencrypted on the Jenkins master where they could be viewed by users with access to the master file system.
